greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(0)=0; thereafter a(n) = noz(n+a(n-1)), where noz(n) = A004719(n).
link: N. J. A. Sloane, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5000
maple: noz:=proc(n) local a,t1,i,j; a:=0; t1:=convert(n,base,10); for i from 1 to nops(t1) do j:=t1[nops(t1)+1-i]; if j <> 0 then a := 10*a+j; fi; od: a; end;
t1:=[0]; for n from 1 to 50 do t1:=[op(t1),noz(n+t1[n])]; od: t1;
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 11 2014
